name: @adobe/commerce-cif-api-test-generation
description: Adobe Commerce Integration Framework (CIF) - API Testing Kit - Test Case Generator
author: Adobe Systems Inc.

scripts.generate: node generate-tests.js all --swagger swagger.json --template junit-template.tpl --target ../unit/src/test/java/com/adobe/cq/CloudSampleTest.java && node generate-tests.js all --swagger swagger.json --template action-template.tpl --target ../unit/src/test/java/com/adobe/cq/CloudSampleActions.java && mkdir -p ../unit/src/test/resources/com/adobe/cq && cp swagger.json ../unit/src/test/resources/com/adobe/cq/swagger.json
scripts.toughday: node generate-tests.js single --swagger swagger.json --template toughday-template.tpl --target ../performance/cloud-perf-example/src/main/java/com/adobe/cq/Test.java && node generate-tests.js all --swagger swagger.json --template action-template.tpl --target ../performance/cloud-perf-example/src/main/java/com/adobe/cq/CloudSampleActions.java
